page.title: 17 Radio Oxford
page.content: Radio Oxford is a local radio station,it broadcasts to Banbury, Basingstoke,Cirencester and Swindon.It was opened on the 29th of October 1970.It is small as it only three studios in Summertown and one in Walton street. They employ forty-two people, twelve of them are the presenters. They do all sorts of programs:sport ,music ,travel and news.They also record requests.This is how it works:when you press a white button it records your message.(This is used frequently).They broadcast twelve hours a day and use a hundred miles of tape. We did a survey to see how many parents listen to it:out of twenty-five eleven listen in the morning this means 44% listen to it. Radio Oxford has good sports coverage and good coverage of events.
